item.description: Our second annual Seacoast Girls Night Out will take on May 11, from 6:30 p.m. to 9:30 p.m. Drinkwater Productions LLC will bring together talented designers, and the area's very best shops, skin-care experts, and lifestyle service providers to create an indulgent evening for its guests. Live music from Chronic Jazz Syndrome and complimentary appetizers will help create an evening out you won't soon forget. Besides the festive ambience, you'll be sure to find something special for the mothers in your life by shopping the many vendors showcasing clothing, home d√©cor, skin-care products, handcrafted jewelry and more.
item.name: 2ND Annual Seacoast Girls Night Out
